documents.document: @Sjbrophy good one. might do the same.
It feels like so little, but it is the very least thing I can do.
Started with the Taoiseach. Will do more on my lunch break.
I'm writing to my political representatives today. We need to stand up for human rights and our fellow human beings. #MuslimBan
I just signed this petition to @EndaKennyTD to take a stand https://t.co/VEmctYn3Nc
@neasaconneally the worst is people affirming it won't effect the illegal Irish. Phew tg it's a racist law!
@BittrScrptReadr spent the days after the election result saying 'I know too much.'
@BittrScrptReadr all my expertise in the area tells me we could be even more epically fucked than those opinion pieces think
Well this morning I decided @mcgregor_ewan was cool enough for me to follow. I'm sure it's the crowning moment of his life
@aoifecasey13 silly is usually a plus for me!
@aoifecasey13 it's very silly
I feel sorry for those of you who have to see this film without my witty commentary
There are a lot of great, worthy films out this week, so I made sure I went to see xXx: the return of Xander Cage
Its very hard to steal chocolate and run away without it melting in your hand.... I mean..... nothing... ðŸ˜¬

I'm moving the same week as the Obamas. Coincidence?
Yes.
@neasaconneally the difference between protected and unprotected sex always cracks me up icon-wise
My last chance to clean the place I'm moving out of and there's a major power outage #cleaninginthedark!
@valerieloftus one time I got up when they called 'Marie', saying 'my name is actually MÃ¡ire' ... nope they meant Marie. Morto
@sarahthemoose I remember you seemed to have a constant grind and tough living situation. Glad you're doing ok now ðŸ˜˜
Lying down is great all the same
@301N I'm sticking with Luke Cage for the moment!
I'm just bitter because I've been carrying heavy things instead
I'm not watching #Sherlock but I'm relieved to see you all have opinions.
I knew sitting down was a mistake but when you move an armchair you are legally obliged to sit in it #Idontmaketherules
@BrokenBiros I know right??
What Tabletop Gaming Taught Me About Feminist Fitness, Inclusiveness, and Body Image (Guest Post) https://t.co/4PqTWodMsT via @SamJaneB
I am woman, see me hold my breath repeatedly to try and stop hiccuping.
I have consistent style envy of @octaviaspencer. One time I scrolled through her IMDb pics to just bask in her fabulousness
pulled a twisty muscle in my back that's hard to put a hot water bottle on without painful twisting #biology #movingproblems
Nephew (explaining): and if the cow tries to get out, the metal detector will go off Mam: what metal would a cow have? N: a gun
@CathyCClarke I'm watching and thinking 'well they wouldn't have danced like that' and then ðŸ™„ at myself
Pride and Prejudice and Zombies is historically inaccurate
But dad prefers cards with terrible puns and fart jokes
For the record I'm into the non gendering of things - always annoyed at the lack of Star Wars cards for mothers, daughters and aunts
Well I've found the birthday card that would impress my dad the least ... I'm fighting the urge to buy it! https://t.co/3Me6wNYEqz
And I'm probably more likely to run an evil lab than do parkour
Oh because that's how boring it was
Why have I fixated on how I'd run my evil lab?
I would not have an open menu in my canteen as I would be paralysed by indecision daily. Also I bet everything tastes of celery
If I had an evil lab I would Ikea the shit out of it. There'd be cushions and curtains. Who said being evil means you can't be homey
It's a pretty good ad for the game but a pretty boring film
I have thoughts about Assassins Creed: The Movie.
@301N it allows two screens at a time. My parents hog the two screens... as they watch different things in different rooms!
The feckers keep locking me out of it. In retrospect I wish I'd tied up their phoneline more as a teenager as preemptive revenge.
I have few regrets but one of them is definitely giving my parents access to my Netflix account.
This getting up in the dark is for suckers
And now, to close the winter festivities, the traditional night of lying in bed awake worrying about not getting enough sleep
@Scriblit "on a huge pile of money with many beautiful ladies"
@Scriblit all my Arnie impressions are actually Rainier Wolfcastle
Oh god it's the annual resetting of the alarm clock
If I have to put my bin out tonight, then you should all have to as well.
@aoifemrtn penguin classic I think (I've just packed it in a box due to moving) it cost me Â£1 at the time
@aoifemrtn I had it hidden in my work intray and I would sneak read it when the office was empty for 5 mins
@aoifemrtn I really love that book. Once I got into it, it was unputdownable
Happy new year. Here's hoping we don't look back on 2016 as a happier time!
I'm currently halfway through the Princess Diarist. I suspect every time she makes me laugh I'll have a little cry.
When I was young I idolised Carrie Fisher. As we both got older my admiration only grew. Thank you.
@thunderstormbun the whole group laughed at your comment!
Never underestimate the power of lip balm in battle #DnD https://t.co/cws4d2wG5V
Xmas day pic story: Dog climbs to top of unstable cushion pile, pile collapses, dog falls, digs herself out. https://t.co/vqi1qEgjyz
@chiller just don't try and move to dublin - there's no housing!
@CAwkward my dad nearly opened up a decades old conflict by offering me sprouts today!
Happy Christmas all. On the way to dinner at my brothers. He has threatened no turkey!
It took a large box and a pouch with about 6 to spare
Was slightly worried I wouldn't have enough maltesers https://t.co/ujg1OCYyIb
I have packed one box #yesitsanothermove
Ok this is my favourite Christmas tree of the year @TCD_Chemistry https://t.co/IVyu7oIBPM
I took both of these photos in my neighbourhood on different roads, but like what is happening?!
Eventually I'll have enough of these for my 'Teddy Bears Exposed' photo exhibition. https://t.co/KXYuvqxYgv
Got up early to collect an enormous roll of bubble wrap, so now I'm watching uncle buck as a reward!
Tonight's #dnd Christmas party will be a hastily prepared homebrew with far to many Christmas puns
I couldn't decide what to drink but it turns out southern comfort and disaronno is a magical combination
I have such a vivid recollection of that night. Also out at a work party and walked home in torrential rain https://t.co/Cs635kZuRp
Had to open a window #fiercemild
I have a lot on my mind right now. Admittedly some of it is trying to breed a Christmas Monster in a game https://t.co/ih7WiVBKVs
I'm only ever momentarily pretending to be an adult. But like that's everyone, right? Right? .... right?
@ickle_tayto no, "Last Holiday" with Queen Latifah, and lazy punctuation!
@ickle_tayto confession: I just watched last holiday and enjoyed it
My ladies D&D group is currently obsessed with @SingingMonsters
@aoifecasey13 too late!
I'd like all of Twitter to believe that we did not eat the out of date biscuits.
I bought these today! I expected better @marksandspencer #birthdayruined https://t.co/q9PomkaG8u
Episode 41: NaNoWriMo past the half way point https://t.co/qpXyZwBAOh
Now that my niece is 4 I think she might be a super villain. And that her interest in minions is really about their labour force potential
when my nephew was 4, I thought that his ideal job might be working in a food truck at a building site - cooking, diggers, things on wheels
The intro to Wine, Women & Westeros hurt my heart. I remember when we had hope! It's still great though! @JenniferCheek @thatbetsylady
My mental state can probably be tracked by Netflix based on when I watch Arthur Christmas and the Curse of the Wererabbit
I have an episode of @IrishWritersPod waiting to be edited on my laptop. I hope to get round to it soon.
Guest Post: A post-election guide to changing hearts and minds https://t.co/mNAqFEWMo8 via @wordpressdotcom
What the actual fuck world? I'd like to say we had a good run but I feel we never really gave being cool to each other a proper try
So which sign of the apocalypse is freezing fog? I've been distracted this week and I've lost track
I took the day off to make this. Worth it! https://t.co/VXKkzy1wdG
I just noticed the Winchester brothers wear a lot of lip gloss. I bet Dean's is cherry flavoured #supernatural
@jowrotethis the bugle made me laugh in my despair
@WhatKateDoes kinda worried that that makes me vintage as well. And I am still young... or at least not grown up yet
I just realised that today I'm wearing a skirt I bought in the 90s.
Long overdue cinema day @cineworld: Dr Strange and Arrival.
It may look like I wasted today but I also built a car ... well most of it https://t.co/4MzdsG1vaU
and to @FocusIreland because its cold outside and we have a homelessness crisis https://t.co/HXbiUzoxqP
